translation.en: Oh, it's so cold.
It's like a thousand needles poking into you.
translation.es: Son como mil agujas que se te clavan.

translation.en: It finally feels like Christmas.
translation.es: Por fin se siente como Navidad.

translation.en: I can't believe you grew up with this. Is this Philly or the ice planet Hoth?
translation.es: No puedo creer que hayas crecido con esto. ¿Es Filadelfia o el planeta de hielo Hoth?

translation.en: Yeah, listen.
Uh, when you first meet my dad, maybe cool it with the Star Wars talk.
translation.es: Cuando conozcas a mi papá, no hables tanto de La guerra de las galaxias.

translation.en: Just until he gets to know you. And then...
translation.es: Solo hasta que te conozca. Y luego...

translation.en: - I don't know, maybe also after. - Aww.
You're so cute when you're trying to hide who I am.
translation.es: Eres tan linda cuando intentas ocultar quién soy.

translation.en: Emmy, I got this.
I know. Just... I want him to love you as much as I love you.
translation.es: Lo sé. Solo quiero que te ame tanto como yo.

translation.en: Okay. Well, my dad said he'd be here at 8:45, and it's 8:40...
translation.es: Mi papá dijo que llegaría a las 8:45 y ya son las...

translation.en: ...five.
Hey! There he is!
- Hey, Dad! Merry almost- Christmas! - Mmm.
Welcome home, sweetie!
This must be Matt.
Hey.
Good to finally meet you in person.
translation.es: Qué gusto conocerte en persona al fin.

translation.en: How was the flight?
Ah, you know, red- eyes are tough. Always hard to get much sleep.
translation.es: Los vuelos nocturnos son duros. Siempre es difícil dormir.

translation.en: I can sleep anywhere.
I trained my body to sleep through air strikes
translation.es: Entrené mi cuerpo para dormir durante ataques aéreos

translation.en: when I led a platoon in Desert Storm.
translation.es: cuando lideré un pelotón en la Tormenta del Desierto.

translation.en: Wow. I just...
translation.es: Vaya, yo solo tomo medio somnífero y bebo vino tinto.

translation.en: take half an Ambien and drink red wine. Your thing's cooler.
translation.es: Vaya, yo solo tomo medio somnífero y bebo vino tinto. Lo suyo es mejor.

translation.en: Mixing drugs and alcohol.
Interesting.
Okay! Here we go.  Let's...
- All right. - Yeah.
Oh, you got your ax.
So, how's your band?
- Had any gigs? - Oh.
A few. Mostly still paying our dues.
translation.es: Algunos. Seguimos pagando derecho de piso.

translation.en: Paying dues, not rent, huh?
translation.es: Pagando derecho de piso y no la renta.

translation.en: Just kidding ya.
Good one.
Oh, look at me, back of a cop car.
It's like I'm a perp, you know, and you're the-- Oh!
translation.es: Como si fuera un delincuente y usted...

translation.en: I feel like a bad boy back here.
translation.es: Me siento como un chico malo aquí.

translation.en: Oh, dang it. I left my mittens on the plane.
translation.es: Cielos. Dejé mis guantes en el avión.

translation.en: Hey, Em.
You remember my buddy, Ted Boseman?
- No. - Oh, yeah you do.
Anyway, I ran into him at church last Sunday,
translation.es: En fin, me lo encontré en la iglesia el domingo pasado,

translation.en: and it turns out he's kind of a big deal here at D&P Financial.
translation.es: y resulta que tiene un puesto importante aquí en D&P Financial.

translation.en: And he wants to chat with you about opportunities right here in Philly.
translation.es: Y quiere hablar contigo sobre oportunidades aquí en Filadelfia.

translation.en: - Oh. - What, you mean like her move back here?
translation.es: ¿Te refieres a que se mude aquí?

translation.en: Seat belt, please.
Dad, I already have a finance job in LA,
translation.es: Papá, ya tengo un trabajo de finanzas en Los Ángeles, donde vivo con el hombre que amo.

translation.en: where I live with the guy that I love.
translation.es: en Los Ángeles, donde vivo con el hombre que amo.

translation.en: - How are you doing back there, sweetie? - Bulletproof glass is hard.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo vas ahí atrás, cariño? - El vidrio a prueba de balas es duro.

translation.en: Yeah, forget I mentioned it.
But, uh...
Ah, keep it in mind.
Got the Christmas lights out, ready to go.
translation.es: Ya tienen listas las luces de Navidad.

translation.en: Love it. Love it.
We put our lights up today, and we take them down on New Year's Day.
translation.es: Pusimos nuestras luces hoy y las quitaremos en Año Nuevo.

translation.en: Emmy's mom, she had a rule.
translation.es: La mamá de Emmy tenía una regla.

translation.en: Ten days, that's it. This ain't Las Vegas.
translation.es: Diez días, eso es todo. Esto no es Las Vegas.

translation.en: Everybody's coming over tonight for the Quinn family house lighting.
translation.es: Todos vendrán esta noche para la iluminación de la casa Quinn.

translation.en: Tradition's my dad's favorite thing. Right up there with Law & Order.
translation.es: La tradición es la cosa favorita de papá. Junto con La ley y el orden.

translation.en: The show and the thing.
Our house lighting, tree trimming, caroling, midnight mass,
translation.es: Iluminar la casa, cortar el árbol, los villancicos, la misa de medianoche,

translation.en: Christmas brunch, Christmas dinner, a sensible New Year's Eve celebration.
translation.es: el brunch de Navidad, la cena de Navidad, una celebración sensata de Año Nuevo.

translation.en: The world might change...
The Quinns...
never will.
Remember when you asked why I moved across the country?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando preguntaste por qué me mudé?

translation.en: Here it is!
The house that made all this.
translation.es: La casa que hizo todo esto.

translation.en: This is nice.
I want the full tour, - but can I take a quick nap? - Yeah.
translation.es: Quiero la gira completa, pero ¿puedo dormir un poco?

translation.en: I just want to be on my game when I meet the--
translation.es: Quiero estar preparado para cuando vea...

translation.en: Oh, my God!
The prodigal sister returns. Give me hugs, come here! I want them! Oh!
translation.es: La hermana pródiga regresa. ¡Dame abrazos, ven aquí! ¡Los quiero!

translation.en: Matt, this is my sister Patsy and her husband Todd.
translation.es: Matt, ella es mi hermana Patsy y su esposo Todd.

translation.en: Mr. Rock 'n' Roller. Coming in for a hug. I'm a hugger.
translation.es: El señor rockero. Dame un abrazo. Me gusta abrazar.

translation.en: Okay.
- Thanks for coming over to welcome us. - Oh, your dad said we had to.
translation.es: - Gracias por recibirnos. - Tu papá dijo que debíamos hacerlo.

translation.en: And I said, Heck, I want to.
translation.es: Y yo dije: Claro, yo quiero.

translation.en: So, who's hungry? I'm making eggies like Mom used to make.
translation.es: ¿Tienen hambre? Hice huevos como los hacía mamá.

translation.en: Not as good, obviously. But not bad, if I do say so myself.
translation.es: No tan bien, obviamente. Pero no están mal, si me permiten decirlo.

translation.en: And I do!
Please have an eggie.
- We arrested a mall Santa last night. - Mm.
translation.es: Anoche arrestamos a un Santa de centro comercial.

translation.en: He lost a toe breaking into Victoria's Secret.
translation.es: Perdió un dedo al entrar a Victoria's Secret.

translation.en: Nancy, the nurse at the hospital, she says,
translation.es: Nancy, la enfermera del hospital, dijo:

translation.en: Somebody just made his own naughty list.
translation.es: Alguien acaba de escribir su propia lista de traviesos.

translation.en: She's a hoot.
Oh. Well, there'll be coal in his lace stocking, huh?
translation.es: Habrá carbón en su calceta de encaje.

translation.en: Want to go get some sleep, Matt?
I really do.
- Well, look who's here from Hollyweird. - Hi!
Oh. Matt, this is my brother Sean, his wife Joy.
translation.es: Matt, él es mi hermano Sean, su esposa Joy.

translation.en: - Hey, Matt! - Sean Jr. Hi!
Donny. Oh, Baby Margie!
There'll be a test on these names later.
translation.es: Habrá un examen de nombres más tarde.

translation.en: Not really.
My name's easy. You look at me, what do you see?
translation.es: Mi nombre es fácil. Mírame, ¿qué ves?

translation.en: Joy. Donny, stop playing with the knives.
translation.es: Joy. Donny, deja de jugar con los cuchillos.

translation.en: Sean Jr., you are getting so big. You look like you could be an Avenger.
translation.es: Sean Jr., estás creciendo mucho. Pareces un Vengador.

translation.en: You don't need to do that.
Yeah! He's in a fun new phase.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Está en una nueva fase divertida.

translation.en: So, Matt. LA boy. You a Rams fan?
translation.es: Entonces, Matt. El chico de Los Ángeles. ¿Eres fan de los Rams?

translation.en: Uh, I don't really like football.
I love it.
You know, Super Bowls, touchdowns, just all of it.
Tom Brady. I mean, he's one of 'em.
translation.es: Tom Brady. Es uno de ellos.

translation.en: You got me. I was like, Uh- oh, Em got a dud.
translation.es: Me engañaste. Pensé: Ay, no. Em se consiguió a un inútil.

translation.en: Pats, we doing eggies? Yeah.
- Which way is the bathroom? - Right there.
You know, it's just-- It's pee.
He seems nice.
But is he worth staying in California,
translation.es: Pero ¿vale la pena quedarse en California

translation.en: with all the earthquakes and the fires and Californians?
translation.es: con los terremotos, los incendios y los californianos?

translation.en: At least admit that it was inconsiderate.
translation.es: Al menos admite que fue desconsiderado.

translation.en: Oh, my God. It's not that big of a deal, Alan.
translation.es: Dios mío. Tampoco es para tanto, Alan.

translation.en: I just wish you'd shown me the Christmas card before mailing them to everyone we know.
translation.es: Ojalá me hubieras mostrado la tarjeta de Navidad antes de enviársela a todos.

translation.en: Great! You can be in charge next year.
- Good! - Awesome!
- Fantastic! - Can you double- cheese that thing?
Hi, sis. Sorry we're late.
translation.es: Hola, hermana. Perdón por la demora.

translation.en: Someone only started caring about the Christmas cards
translation.es: Alguien se preocupó por las tarjetas de Navidad

translation.en: after I mailed them out this morning.
translation.es: después de que las mandé esta mañana.

translation.en: Gosh, who could someone be?
How do we crack that code?
Who wants an eggie? Kayla, Alan? You want an eggie?
- I want a divorce. - What?
- What? - What?
Okay, I'm sorry I didn't show you the cards.
translation.es: Bueno, lamento no haberte mostrado las tarjetas.

translation.en: Now, can we please move on?
No. I- I want a divorce.
I didn't mean for it to come out like this, but...
...you have to admit we're not happy.
You're leaving me?
Now? Well, there's not really a good time.
translation.es: - ¿Ahora? - Bueno, nunca es un buen momento.

translation.en: Yes, there is.
When you die. That's when you leave, Alan.
translation.es: Cuando mueras. Ahí es cuando te vas, Alan.

translation.en: Till death do us part.
translation.es: Hasta que la muerte nos separe.

translation.en: Death, Alan, not Christmas.
Hey. Let me guess. Kayla and Alan.
translation.es: Oye. Déjame adivinar. Kayla y Alan.

translation.en: Patsy, I think I'm ready for that name test.
translation.es: Patsy, creo que estoy listo para ese examen.

translation.en: We fight every day.
We haven't had sex in a year!
translation.es: No hemos tenido sexo en un año.

translation.en: I can't believe you're talking about this in front of my entire family.
translation.es: No puedo creer que estés hablando de esto frente a toda mi familia.

translation.en: And that guy.
You're with your entire family all the time.
translation.es: Estás con toda tu familia todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Everything happens in front of them, and because of them.
translation.es: Todo pasa frente a ellos y por ellos.

translation.en: We're the reason you're bailing on your marriage?
translation.es: ¿Nosotros somos la razón por la que dejas tu matrimonio?

translation.en: We're the problem?
We're delightful.
Kay.
We don't have kids.
So, yeah,
I think it's best to rip the Band- Aid off and move on.
translation.es: creo que es mejor arrancar la curita y seguir adelante.

translation.en: And Don, did you just unsnap the holster of your service revolver?
translation.es: Y Don, ¿acabas de desabrochar la pistolera de tu revólver?

translation.en: If you want to leave,
then go.
Now.
Back door, buddy.
Your mom's eggies?
Always too salty.
No wonder he didn't want our cards to go out.
translation.es: Con razón no quería que mandara las tarjetas.

translation.en: Happy Holidays from Kayla and Alan?
It was a lie.
Honey, uh...
You put Happy Holidays, not Merry Christmas?
translation.es: ¿Pones Felices fiestas, y no Feliz Navidad?

translation.en: He means that we love you
- and we're here for you. - Yes. Honey.
translation.es: - y que estamos para ti. - Sí.

translation.en: - Of course. - What am I gonna do?
I woke up this morning and everything was fine, and now...
translation.es: Me desperté esta mañana y todo estaba bien. Y ahora...

translation.en: Now, I don't even want to go home.
translation.es: No quiero ni volver a casa.

translation.en: But you could stay here.
As long as you want. This will always be your home.
translation.es: Tanto como quieras. Esta siempre será tu casa.

translation.en: Yeah.
And I'll be here.
Ooh, it'll be just like the old days.
translation.es: Será como en los viejos tiempos.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mom.
A Quinn getting divorced.
I don't know what happened.
Well? Hug me!
Oh, Jesus!
Sorry.
- What are you guys doing? - Nothing.
Just... this eggnog went bad.
Yeah, it's just a bad...
- nog situation. - Oh.
Looked like you were pouring one out to someone.
translation.es: Parecía que le servías a un muerto.

translation.en: No. No.
No.
I feel so bad for Kayla.
Yeah.
But...
you know...
Two sides to every story.
Alan has his issues, but Kayla can be a bit of a--
translation.es: Alan tiene sus problemas, pero Kayla puede ser un poco...

translation.en: - Pill. - A big pill.
Wow. Okay.
You know, I- I like getting the in- laws take on this stuff,
translation.es: Me gusta escuchar la versión de la familia política,

translation.en: 'cause I'm hoping to be one of you guys soon.
translation.es: porque espero ser uno de ustedes pronto.

translation.en: I'm gonna ask Emmy to marry me.
translation.es: Le voy a pedir matrimonio a Emmy.

translation.en: Christmas morning.
We need to tell him.
- No, we can't trust him. - He needs to know.
translation.es: - No, no podemos confiar en él. - Necesita saberlo.

translation.en: Obviously, I can hear you.
Hi.
Okay, look. Emmy's great. You guys should totally get married.
translation.es: Mira. Emmy es genial. Deberían casarse.

translation.en: Just do it far away from here.
LA's good. Hawaii's better.
translation.es: L. A. está bien. Hawái es mejor.

translation.en: Guam is still America.
- I don't know what happened. - B- B- Be cool.
translation.es: - No sé qué pasó... - Actúa casual.

translation.en: - We're here for you. - Of course.
We were pouring one out.
translation.es: Sí estábamos sirviéndole a un muerto.

translation.en: To Alan.
We have a sort of support group.
Support group for what?
The people who married into this family.
translation.es: La gente que se casó con esta familia.

translation.en: The Quinns are great.
But when they're together, which is almost every day...
translation.es: Pero cuando están juntos, que es casi siempre...

translation.en: Pizza Fridays, Sunday brunches, pop- ins, stop- bys, meetups, hangouts.
translation.es: Viernes de pizza, almuerzos de domingo, visitas, paradas, reuniones.

translation.en: Don has a saying: There's the Quinn way and the wrong way.
translation.es: Don tiene un dicho: Está la manera Quinn y la manera incorrecta.

translation.en: How to spend your money. How to vote. Where to vacation.
translation.es: Cómo gastar tu dinero. Cómo votar. A dónde ir de vacaciones.

translation.en: - What kind of soda to drink. - Pepsi.
It's always got to be Pepsi.
And our spouses think the Quinn way is normal.
translation.es: Y nuestros cónyuges creen que la manera Quinn es normal.

translation.en: But it's like a cult.
A G- rated cult.
translation.es: Un culto para toda la familia.

translation.en: We secretly meet at this bar, Otto's. Just to talk stuff out.
translation.es: Nos reunimos en secreto en el bar Otto's. Solo para hablar de cosas.

translation.en: And the family will never catch us there because Quinns don't drink.
translation.es: Y la familia nunca nos atrapará porque los Quinn no beben.

translation.en: Don says alcohol is a crutch, which I guess is true,
translation.es: Don dice que el alcohol es una muleta, lo cual es cierto, pero también,

translation.en: but also, you know, shut up.
translation.es: Don dice que el alcohol es una muleta, lo cual es cierto, pero también, cállate.

translation.en: We, uh, call ourselves the Outlaw In- laws.
- No, we don't. Todd does. - It's good.
translation.es: - No. Solo Todd nos llama así. - Es bueno.

translation.en: Outlaw In- laws!
Thanks. But Emmy's not like that at all.
translation.es: Miren, gracias. Pero Emmy no es para nada así. Bebe coca y alcohol.

translation.en: She drinks Coke and alcohol.
translation.es: Pero Emmy no es para nada así. Bebe coca y alcohol.

translation.en: That's because she's been away.
translation.es: Eso es porque no ha estado aquí.

translation.en: But in the four or five days you're here, she'll get sucked back in.
translation.es: Pero en los cinco días que estén aquí, la volverán a meter.

translation.en: We're here for ten days.
- Oh, Lord. - Oh, you poor bastard.
- - Hey.
I'm so glad you're here.
Me too.
How do you think I'm doing so far? Great.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo crees que voy hasta ahora? - Genial.

translation.en: In fact, you'd better pace yourself with all that charm.
translation.es: De hecho, deberías calmarte con tanto encanto.

translation.en: We still got a lot of trip left.
Oh, well, I have a lot of charm left.
- With razzle- dazzle to spare. -
Can I take a nap now?
- Oh, look. - Oh!
The lovebirds.
Hey, Kayla.
How you feelin'?
Sad.
Angry.
Confused.
A little hungry.
Well, how about a little food for the soul?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal un poco de comida para el alma?

translation.en: Any requests?
Do you know the song Not Now by you?
translation.es: ¿Conoces la canción Ahora no de ti?

translation.en: So, Matt.
Kayla and I shared this room when we were kids.
translation.es: Kayla y yo compartíamos este cuarto cuando éramos niñas.

translation.en: - Yeah. Now it's her and you. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Sí. Ahora son ella y tú. - Sí.

translation.en: I just keep getting cut out of people's lives.
translation.es: Me sacan de la vida de la gente.

translation.en: Oh, well...
Do you want to stay in here with me tonight?
Matt could take the spare room. Right, Matt?
translation.es: Matt puede ir a otro cuarto, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Oh, yes. That would make me feel so much better.
translation.es: Sí. Eso me haría sentir mucho mejor.

translation.en: - Oh, good. - Thank you.
Oh, you want me to go now?
- Mm- hmm. - Thank you.
Man, puberty hit the Keller kids hard.
translation.es: La pubertad les pegó fuerte a los Keller.

translation.en: - Hey, can I talk to you guys? - Sure, sweetie.
Oh, a sit- down talk.
You're not pregnant, are you?
So...
I know you've been wondering why I've been all, like, quiet lately.
translation.es: Sé que se han preguntado por qué he estado tan callado últimamente.

translation.en: I've been trying to figure out how to tell you.
I, um...
I have these feelings.
In me.
I tried talking myself out of it, feeling this way, but...
translation.es: Intenté convencerme de no sentirme así, pero...

translation.en: ...it's who I am.
Sorry, go ahead.
Or we could do this later. Up to you. You want to do it later?
translation.es: O puede ser después. Depende de ti. ¿Quieres hablar después?

translation.en: No.
I wanted you to know that I'm...
I'm an atheist.
Oh, we love you no matter--
What?
He's an atheist.
I thought he was gonna say...
translation.es: Pensé que iba a decir que...

translation.en: I'm having more water.
I was nervous to tell you 'cause you raised me all Catholic
translation.es: Estaba nervioso por decirles, porque me criaron como católico y no quiero molestarlos.

translation.en: and I didn't want to upset you.
translation.es: porque me criaron como católico y no quiero molestarlos.

translation.en: Oh, we're not upset.
Right, Sean?
So, do I tell Poppy Don
I'm not going to church on Christmas Eve, or should you?
translation.es: que no iré a la iglesia en Nochebuena o ustedes le dicen?

translation.en: How's that now?
I mean, obviously I'm not gonna go and just pretend to believe in God.
translation.es: Es obvio que no voy a ir y fingir que creo en Dios.

translation.en: Right. No. Obviously not.
Kayla, guess what I did to make you feel better.
translation.es: Kayla, adivina qué hice para que te sientas mejor.

translation.en: Invented a time machine and undid all my life choices.
translation.es: ¿Inventaste una máquina del tiempo y eliminaste todas mis decisiones?

translation.en: Almost. Um, yeah.
I, uh, dug up Mom's old Christmas cookie cutters, and...
translation.es: Encontré los viejos cortadores de galletas de mamá y...

translation.en: Ta- da!
They remind me of Mom.
- Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't think that-- - I still want them.
translation.es: - Lo siento, no pensé que... - Aún así las quiero.

translation.en: Hey, um...
You don't need to keep trying to be Mom for her.
translation.es: No tienes que intentar ser mamá para ella.

translation.en: Yeah.
- Gonna keep trying to be Mom for her? - So much.
This is going to look great.
I mean, that angel is...
angelic.
It goes on the roof.
Represents Emmy's mom, looking down on all of us.
translation.es: Representa a la mamá de Emmy, mirándonos a todos.

translation.en: Wow.
Yeah, we've had this house lighting tradition for years.
translation.es: Hace años que tenemos esta tradición de iluminación.

translation.en: We let the grandkids flip on the lights. We sing carols, drink hot cider.
translation.es: Dejamos que los nietos prendan las luces. Cantamos villancicos, bebemos sidra.

translation.en: Oh, I love hot cider.
People are always coming up to me, like, Hot chocolate rules.
translation.es: La gente siempre dice: El chocolate caliente es mejor.

translation.en: I'm like, Get away, dude. No way.
translation.es: Y yo digo: Vete. De ninguna manera.

translation.en: I'm a cider guy. Hot cider for me, thanks.
translation.es: Soy sidrero. Una sidra caliente para mí, gracias.

translation.en: We're gonna have hot chocolate, too.
Also really good.
Anyway...
I'm in love with your daughter, Mr. Quinn.
translation.es: Estoy enamorado de su hija, señor Quinn.

translation.en: And when a man loves a woman who...
translation.es: Y cuando un hombre ama a una mujer que...

translation.en: has a father...
traditionally...
Are you asking for my blessing to marry Emmy?
translation.es: ¿Me estás pidiendo mi bendición para casarte con Emmy?

translation.en: Yes, I- I was.
I am.
You are the first of my three daughters' suitors
translation.es: Eres el primero de los pretendientes de mis tres hijas

translation.en: to have the guts to do this.
translation.es: que tiene las agallas para hacerlo.

translation.en: I really appreciate it.
You are quite welcome.
Which makes it that much harder to say no.
translation.es: Eso hace que sea más difícil decir que no.

translation.en: You know, after this whole Alan thing, I just...
translation.es: Después de todo lo de Alan,

translation.en: realized I got to be more careful about who I let into this family.
translation.es: me di cuenta de que debo ser más cuidadoso con mi familia.

translation.en: But thanks for asking.
It means a lot.
Not enough, but a lot.
So he stomped on your hopes and dreams.
translation.es: Pisoteó tus esperanzas y tus sueños.

translation.en: Welcome to the club, buddy.
I don't need his permission to ask, you know?
translation.es: No necesito su permiso para preguntar, ¿saben?

translation.en: I was just trying to be a gentleman.
See, that's why I didn't ask for permission to marry Patsy.
translation.es: Por eso yo no pedí permiso para casarme con Patsy.

translation.en: Lost his respect, but avoided his wrath.
translation.es: Perdí su respeto, pero evité su ira.

translation.en: Wassup!
Like I said, hold off on asking Emmy to marry you on this trip.
translation.es: Como dije, no le propongas a Emmy en este viaje.

translation.en: But Christmas is the perfect time.
translation.es: Pero Navidad es el momento perfecto.

translation.en: You know what? He thinks he can intimidate me.
translation.es: ¿Saben qué? Él cree que puede intimidarme.

translation.en: But when I want something, I go for it.
translation.es: Pero cuando quiero algo, lo hago.

translation.en: I just need to prove to him that I'm good enough.
translation.es: Solo debo probarle que soy suficiente.

translation.en: No. Not good enough.
Perfect.
- He's like a hurt baby duck. - Mm- hmm.
You want to help, but maybe it's best to let him waddle into the bushes - and die. - Oh.
translation.es: Quieres ayudar, pero quizá sea mejor dejarlo meterse en los arbustos y morir.

translation.en: Still got it.
Oh, God.
Hey. Just wanted to check in, see if you needed any help.
translation.es: Hola. Solo quería ver si necesitaba ayuda.

translation.en: I want to show you that I'm a, uh... a, uh...
a vessel of dependability.
A vessel of--
Are you high, rock star?
'Cause you know I can still bust you for that. This ain't LA.
translation.es: Porque sabes que aún puedo arrestarte por eso. Esto no es L. A.

translation.en: Or Colorado. Or Maine, or Alaska, or...
translation.es: O Colorado, o Maine, o Alaska o...

translation.en: Good Lord, it'd take less time to tell you the good states.
translation.es: Dios mío, tardaría menos en decirte los buenos estados.

translation.en: Matt? What are you doing up there?
Just, uh, helping your dad with the lights.
translation.es: Solo ayudo a tu papá con las luces.

translation.en: Dad, do you want help?
Sure don't.
Matt, come on, we're making a fire. Come watch Elf with me and Kayla.
translation.es: Matt, vamos. Prendimos la chimenea. Ven a ver Elf conmigo y Kayla.

translation.en: My family's gonna be here in an hour.
translation.es: Mi familia llegará en una hora.

translation.en: It's best to just let my dad do things his way. The Quinn way.
translation.es: Es mejor dejar que mi papá haga las cosas a su manera. - La manera Quinn. - De hecho, no sabía que era tan tarde.

translation.en: Actually, I didn't know it was that late.
translation.es: - La manera Quinn. - De hecho, no sabía que era tan tarde.

translation.en: I'm gonna need some help to finish in time.
translation.es: Voy a necesitar ayuda para terminar a tiempo.

translation.en: Great. I'll stay.
I am here for you.
All right.
On the roof.
Which is actually a lot higher than you'd think.
translation.es: Lo cual es mucho más difícil de lo que crees.

translation.en: I got a bad feeling about this.
Hey, nice.
That's a line from Star Wars.
translation.es: Es una frase de La guerra de las galaxias.

translation.en: It's actually repeated in many of the, uh-- Oh, you don't care.
translation.es: Se repite en muchos de los... No te importa.

translation.en: You know, this is actually still a little crooked.
- Let me fix it real quick. - Hey.
- We still have a lot to do. -
I hear you, Mr. Quinn. But as an artist,
translation.es: Lo escucho, señor Quinn. Pero como artista,

translation.en: - I have an eye for these things. - Hey, look!
translation.es: - tengo un ojo para estas cosas. - ¡Mira!

translation.en: I know you probably hate the term artist.
translation.es: Sé que odia el término artista.

translation.en: No, no! Look! Look!
- Sorry. Sorry! - Don't stomp on her! That's my wife!
Wait.
Oh, my-- Oh, my God, it's sticking right in you.
Oh, look at it. Look at it! Look!
I can't. It's in my forehead.
translation.es: No puedo. Está en mi frente.

translation.en: You are definitely tougher than our nine- toed Santa.
translation.es: Eres más fuerte que nuestro Santa de nueve dedos.

translation.en: Well...
that's the nice part about getting shot early in my career, Nancy.
translation.es: eso es lo bueno de que me dispararan temprano en mi carrera, Nancy.

translation.en: Any pain after that is just playing for second.
translation.es: Cualquier dolor después de eso es menor.

translation.en: My son was ten pounds at birth.
translation.es: Mi hijo pesó cinco kilos al nacer.

translation.en: Every pain since, I'm like, If it ain't a giant baby being yanked out of me,
translation.es: Desde eso, con cada dolor pienso: Si no me está saliendo un bebé gigante,

translation.en: bring it.
This kid staples me in the head and he's the one who faints.
translation.es: Este niño me engrapa la cabeza y él se desmaya.

translation.en: I can't believe this is the one my daughter brings home.
translation.es: No puedo creer que él sea quien mi hija trae a casa.

translation.en: Look, Mr. Quinn. Don.
I know you're used to getting your way, but you--
translation.es: Sé que acostumbra a salirse con la suya...

translation.en: Oh, my God. Is that sticking in your brain?!
translation.es: Dios mío. ¿Se le pegó en el cerebro?

translation.en: Help me, help--
He's a bigger pain than a ten- pound baby.
translation.es: Es un dolor más grande que un bebé de cinco kilos.

translation.en: You're such a hoot.
You're all alone on the holidays, too.
translation.es: También estás sola en las fiestas.

translation.en: Aunt Kayla's talking to a fish.
translation.es: La tía Kayla está hablando con un pez.

translation.en: It's been a long day, bud.
translation.es: Ha sido un día largo, amigo.

translation.en: Where'd Sean Jr. go?
He's talking to my dad. I knew I shouldn't have brought him.
translation.es: Está hablando con mi papá. Sabía que no debía traerlo.

translation.en: You don't think he's gonna tell him he's an atheist when he's in the hospital, do you?
translation.es: No crees que vaya a decirle que es ateo mientras está en el hospital, ¿verdad?

translation.en: I actually think we should be proud of Sean Jr. for not hiding who he is.
translation.es: Creo que deberíamos estar orgullosos de Sean Jr. por no ocultar quién es.

translation.en: Maybe everybody shouldn't have to tiptoe around your dad.
translation.es: Quizá no todos deban andar de puntitas con tu papá.

translation.en: Kayla's talking to a fish and she seems less crazy than you right now.
translation.es: Kayla está hablando con un pez y parece menos loca que tú ahora.

translation.en: I tried to be there for Kayla like Mom would've,
translation.es: Traté de estar ahí para Kayla como lo habría hecho mamá,

translation.en: but everything I did today just made her feel worse.
translation.es: pero todo lo que hice hoy la hizo sentir peor.

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not cut out for it.
translation.es: Tal vez no estoy hecha para eso.

translation.en: Being a mom.
I know it's taking longer than we thought, but it's gonna happen.
translation.es: Sé que está tardando más de lo que pensamos, pero va a pasar.

translation.en: Okay? And when it does,
you're gonna be great.
Now Aunt Kayla's stealing the fish.
translation.es: - ¿De acuerdo? - La tía Kayla está robando el pescado.

translation.en: Our kid will be easier than her.
translation.es: Nuestra hija será más fácil que ella.

translation.en: Hey, bud. I saw you talking to Poppy Don in there.
translation.es: Oye, amigo. Te vi hablando con el abuelo Don.

translation.en: That's fun.
I decided not to tell him.
Oh, thank God.
We're good.
Okay.
I'm gonna go put my face against some cold glass.
translation.es: Voy a pegar mi cara en un vidrio frío.

translation.en: Sweetie,
you know you don't have to be afraid to tell Poppy Don the truth, right?
translation.es: sabes que no debes temer decirle la verdad al abuelo Don, ¿verdad?

translation.en: No, I'm not.
I went in there to tell him. Then I asked how he was doing.
translation.es: Entré para decírselo. Luego le pregunté cómo seguía.

translation.en: And he said he knew he'd be fine
translation.es: Y dijo que sabía que estaría bien

translation.en: because Grammy Margaret was up in heaven watching over him
translation.es: porque la abuela Margaret estaba en el cielo cuidándonos a él

translation.en: and all of us.
I just couldn't do it to the guy.
Well, I guess Dad's house lighting is canceled.
translation.es: Bueno, supongo que la iluminación de papá se canceló.

translation.en: This is just...
The nurse is making me.
I see what you're trying to do.
Fighting for Emmy.
I'm just doing the same thing.
Hey, so we have loving Emmy in common.
translation.es: Los dos amamos a Emmy, tenemos eso en común.

translation.en: That's something, right?
In that it makes us opponents?
Okay.
Did you finish your juice?
Yes.
No.
When you're finished, you're clear to go.
translation.es: Cuando te lo termines, puedes irte.

translation.en: You, on the other hand, your heart rate's a bit elevated.
translation.es: Pero tú, tu ritmo cardíaco está un poco elevado.

translation.en: So I get to keep you a little longer.
translation.es: Así que puedo tenerte un poco más de tiempo.

translation.en: Well...
guess there's worse things.
You, uh...
You like her.
Who? Nancy?
No.
Uh, I like her as someone that I work with, but I don't like her like her. I mean...
translation.es: Me gusta como alguien con quien trabajo, pero no me gusta ella como ella.

translation.en: But even if I did, it's only been three years since my wife died.
translation.es: Aunque me gustara, solo han pasado tres años desde que murió mi esposa.

translation.en: And, uh, again,
I don't like her.
And why am I explaining myself to you? Let's get you out of here.
translation.es: ¿Por qué doy explicaciones? Hay que sacarte de aquí.

translation.en: Okay, Donny.
Hot cider for you, sir.
You couldn't be home for the lights, so I figured we bring the lights to you.
translation.es: No podías estar en casa para las luces así que pensé en traerte las luces.

translation.en: This is something.
I bet Mom's looking down and smiling.
translation.es: Apuesto a que mamá mira hacia abajo y sonríe.

translation.en: You guys did all this for them?
Eh, this family's a pain in the butt, but they're our pain in the butt.
translation.es: Esta familia es una molestia, pero es nuestra molestia.

translation.en: - But yeah, they are a pain in the butt. - Such a pain in the butt. Yeah.
translation.es: - Pero sí, son una molestia. - Una gran molestia. Sí.

translation.en: - Sorry it's been so crazy. -
translation.es: Lamento que haya sido una locura.

translation.en: Oh, at least it's going by quick.
We've already been here, what? Three, four days?
translation.es: Solo hemos estado aquí, ¿cuánto? ¿Tres o cuatro días?

translation.en: - Twelve hours. - Oh, God.
Oh, hi.
Look at you two. Matching bracelets.
- Bracelet buddies. -
Don't ruin it.
Uh... you know what would make this perfect?
If you'd just agree to meet with Ted Boseman.
translation.es: Si aceptaras reunirte con Ted Boseman.

translation.en: - Oh, God. - Not to take a job, just to chat.
translation.es: - Dios. - No para trabajar con él, para platicar.

translation.en: You know,
as a favor to an old man who just got staple- gunned in the head.
translation.es: como un favor a un anciano que acaban de engraparle la cabeza.

translation.en: Okay.
Okay. Stop bugging me and I'll do it.
translation.es: Está bien. Deja de molestarme y lo haré.

translation.en: Wait.
So you are going to meet with that guy?
Oh, just to get my dad off my back. Seriously, don't worry.
translation.es: Solo para que mi papá deje de molestar. En serio, no te preocupes.

translation.en: Worry. Seriously.
Don always gets his way.
translation.es: Don siempre se sale con la suya.

translation.en: - The Quinn way. - Definitely.
I wonder what would happen if we could somehow loosen Don up a bit.
translation.es: Me pregunto qué pasaría si pudiéramos relajar un poco a Don.

translation.en: I mean, that'd be good for all of us, right?
translation.es: Eso sería bueno para todos nosotros, ¿no?

translation.en: The Quinns and Quinn- laws.
translation.es: Para los Quinn y los Quinnpolíticos.

translation.en: Quinn- laws.
Oh, that's good. He's good.
translation.es: Eso es bueno. Él es bueno.

translation.en: Hey, Ted.
Emmy has agreed to meet with you.
Now, all you have to do is just make her a job offer that she can't refuse,
translation.es: Solo tienes que hacerle una oferta de trabajo que no pueda rechazar.

translation.en: and you will have paid me back for not arresting you
translation.es: Y me habrás pagado por no arrestarte

translation.en: for drunk and disorderly,
and attempting to intoxicate a police horse.
translation.es: e intentar intoxicar a un caballo policía.

translation.en: Yeah.
That was a heck of a Thanksgiving night you had there, Ted.
translation.es: Fue una gran noche de Acción de Gracias, Ted.
